TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content: I've never been a very big fan of Star Trek (I think it just goes too silly at times), but Mass Effect was awesome. The fact that it had quarians helped. <3

I can live with it for once.

You can live with your death? Painful death?
Painful death via shovel and other blunt objects? That's not even including the torture.

Painful death via shovel and other blunt objects? That's not even including the torture.

Not just blunt. Sometimes a slash and stab is best according to chobit.

Not just blunt. Sometimes a slash and stab is best according to chobit.

Really? I wasn't aware that they began implementing that...Not that I know anything about their torture and brainwashing...yeah..uh...

*inches away slowly*
I hid a bomb in her car. When she come for me, BOOM! Then I run off.

I hid a bomb in her car. When she come for me, BOOM! Then I run off.

Who says she's coming for you in a car?

I hid a bomb in her car. When she come for me, BOOM! Then I run off.

Car? You insulted Star Trek, their coming with tanks and planes.
By car I mean every vehicle animale or preson she could use to get to me.

By car I mean every vehicle aniamle or preson she could use to get to me.

Who says she needs to get to you? By the way, look behind you.

Suddenly, an antenna extends from Rage097s back.

...you see nothing.

By car I mean every vehicle animale or preson she could use to get to me.

Including the Yamato?

The antenna beeps.

*starts moving involuntaryly torwards rockcoole*
Rockcoole hasn't responded yet, I think we all know what's happened...

I'm back from rock cool-...I mean being mind contro-...I mean...*sigh*

Drops bloody rebar*
Did you leave something for chobit and trekkette to kill?

*points to antenna in skull*

They already killed. Just with a different tool.
*crawls out of bloody hole* I'm ok!

*crawls out of bloody hole* I'm ok!

Begins moving twords roxkcoole again.

EXTERMINATE EXTERMINATE

FOR THE GOD EMPRESS.
Anyway, counting all the votes, Star Trek sucks and Mass Effect 1/2/3 is the best.

If only chobit and trekkette could see this...

And now ROFLCopter64bit is going to die a painful death...
*Hides behind ROLF* I will play mass effect if you save me!

Anyway, counting all the votes, Star Trek sucks and Mass Effect 1/2/3 is the best.

*finishes beating down rockcoole*

*turns to roflcopter*

EXTERMINATE

ORDERS RECEIVED
A harpoon would pass through both of you and immobilise you to be detained at chobit's "pleasure"
*fires said harpoon*
